original: DefinitelyNotSade
Compilation of my 3 vanilla-style Legion quest mods: Five-Card Ante, Yes, I Would Actually, and You Go To My Head.

SCN GreatKhansSupplyObjectives
int button

Begin OnActivate Player
	If GetIsID VBSGreatKhanSupplies == 1
		ShowMessage VBSSuppliesMSG
	Else
		Activate
	EndIf

End

Begin MenuMode  1001
	Set button to GetButtonPressed
	If button == 1
		Activate
	ElseIf button == 2
		Disable
		Player.AddItem VBSDirtySupplies 1
	ElseIf button == 3
		Disable
		Player.AddItem VBSDirtySupplies 1
		Player.RemoveItem WaterUnpurified 3
	ElseIf button == 4
		Disable
		Player.AddItem VBSDirtySupplies 1
		Player.RemoveItem IrradiatedWaterUnpurified 1
	EndIf
End

BEGIN OnAdd Player

	if Player.GetInCell 3CBSCave1
		set VMS36.Cave1SupplyMarker to 1
	elseif Player.GetInCell 3CBSCave2
		set VMS36.Cave2SupplyMarker to 1
	elseif Player.GetInCell 3CBSCave3
		set VMS36.Cave3SupplyMarker to 1
	endif

	if (Player.GetItemCount VBSGreatKhanSupplies == 2 || Player.GetItemCount VBSDirtySupplies >= 2) && GetStage VMS36 >= 10
		SetObjectiveCompleted VMS36 70 1
		SetObjectiveDisplayed VMS36 75 1
		If GetStage YesIWouldActually >= 30 && Player.GetItemCount VBSDirtySupplies >= 2
			SetObjectiveCompleted YesIWouldActually 34 1
			SetObjectiveDisplayed YesIWouldActually 35 1
		EndIf
	endif

END

scn VNelsonHostageRestrain2
		
		float timer
		Short Freed
		Short	DoOnce
		Short 	Button
		Short	iCount					; Counter to enable Legion enemies if hostages are rescued
		Short bBooneReacted;
		Short Home
		int PlantedExplosives

BEGIN GameMode
		;forces to check restrain
		;getfurnituremarkerid == 26

	if DoOnce == 0
          if GetSitting == 3
               IgnoreCrime 1
               setRestrained 1
               set DoOnce to 1
          endif
     endif

; Too many NPCs in the area
	;If VNelson.bLegionSpawned != 1
	;	If Freed == 1
	;		If iCount < 1
	;			NelsonLegion01REF.Enable 1
	;			Set iCount to 1
	;			Return
	;		Elseif iCount == 1
	;			NelsonLegion02REF.Enable 1
	;			Set iCount to 2
	;			Return
	;		Elseif iCount == 2
	;			NelsonLegion03REF.Enable 1
	;			Set iCount to 3
	;			Set VNelson.bLegionSpawned to 1
	;		Endif
	;	Endif
	;Endif

	If NelsonNCRTrooperCheck1REF.GetDead == 1 && NelsonNCRTrooperCheck2REF.GetDead == 1 && NVNelsonRangerMiloREF.GetDead == 1 && GetDead == 0 && PlantedExplosives == 1
		Kill
	EndIf

END

BEGIN OnLoad
		IgnoreCrime 1
			;Cripples both legs for all three
		NelsonNCRHostage01REF.DamageActorValue LeftMobilityCondition 5
		NelsonNCRHostage01REF.DamageActorValue	RightMobilityCondition 5

		NelsonNCRHostage02REF.DamageActorValue LeftMobilityCondition 5
		NelsonNCRHostage02REF.DamageActorValue	RightMobilityCondition 5

		NelsonNCRHostage03REF.DamageActorValue LeftMobilityCondition 5
		NelsonNCRHostage03REF.DamageActorValue	RightMobilityCondition 5
END

Begin onhit player
		setenemy caesarslegionnelsonfaction playerfaction
End
	
BEGIN OnActivate 

If IsActionRef Player == 1
	if ( GetDead == 0 ) && ( Freed == 0 )
		If Eval (GetStage YouGoToMyHead >= 10) && (GetStage YouGoToMyHead < 20)
			ShowMessage YGTMHTecMineHostageAltMSG
		Else
			ShowMessage TecMineHostageMSG
		EndIf
	elseIf ( GetDead == 1 ) || ( Home == 1 )
		Activate
	endif
Endif
END
	

BEGIN Menumode 1001
	
	if ( freed == 0 )
		set button to GetButtonPressed
		if ( button == 1 )
			SetRestrained 0
			ignoreCrime 0
			;Addtofaction NCRFactionNV 1
			;setenemy caesarslegionnelsonfaction playerfaction
			setpcenemyoffaction caesarslegionnelsonfaction 1
			set VNelson.NumHostages to VNelson.NumHostages + 1
			set VNelson.HostagesFreedTotal to VNelson.HostagesFreedTotal + 1;
			if VNelson.NumHostages == 3
				set VNelson.HostagesFreed to 1
				if GetObjectiveDisplayed VNelson 10 == 1 && GetQuestCompleted VNelson == 0			; <<< (Added 7_27_10) Added conditions to address issue where during VMS30: Restoring Hope...
					SetObjectiveDisplayed VNelson 15 1																	; <<<  ...this objective would be set even though the Player had not started VNelson quest yet.
				endif																												; <<< (7_29_10) Changed first condition from "GetQuestRunning" to "GetObjectiveDisplayed" -ETB
			endif
			if (VNPCFollowers.bBooneHired == 1 && bBooneReacted == 0 && VNelson.HostagesFreedTotal + VNelson.HostagesKilled >= 3)
					
					set VDialogueCraigBoone.nOpenness to VDialogueCraigboone.nOpenness + 1;
					if (VNelson.HostagesFreedTotal>= 3)	; bonus for saving all three
						set VDialogueCraigBoone.nOpenness to VDialogueCraigboone.nOpenness + 1;
					endif
					set bBooneReacted to 1;
					CraigBooneREF.SayTo player VDialogueCraigBooneNelsonReactSave
				endif
			set Freed to 1
			evp
		ElseIf button == 2 || button == 4
			SetRestrained 0
			ignoreCrime 0
			Player.RemoveItem Psycho 3
			RemoveFromAllFactions
			AddToFaction vCaesarsLegionFaction 1
			
			SetAV Strength 10
			SetAV Endurance 10
			If button == 2
				SetAV Health ((GetAV Health) * 3)
				SetAV Aggression 1
				SetAV Confidence 4
			EndIf
			Set Freed to 1
			Set YouGoToMyHead.IntimidatedSoldiers to YouGoToMyHead.IntimidatedSoldiers + 1
			Evp
		ElseIf button == 3
			SetRestrained 0
			ignoreCrime 0
			If GetIsReference NelsonNCRHostage02REF == 1
				trapNelsonBIYOB2REF.Enable
				If NVNelsonRangerMiloREF.GetDead == 0
					NVNelsonRangerMiloREF.SetRestrained 1
					NVNelsonRangerMiloREF.MoveTo trapNelsonBIYOB2REF
					NelsonNCRHostage02REF.TravelToREF NVNelsonRangerMiloREF
					Set YouGoToMyHead.NelsonTrooper2FreedExplosives to 1
				EndIf
			ElseIf GetIsReference NelsonNCRHostage01REF == 1
				trapNelsonBIYOB1REF.Enable
				If NelsonNCRTrooperCheck2REF.GetDead == 0
					NelsonNCRTrooperCheck2REF.SetRestrained 1
					NelsonNCRTrooperCheck2REF.MoveTo trapNelsonBIYOB1REF
					NelsonNCRHostage01REF.TravelToREF NelsonNCRTrooperCheck2REF
					Set YouGoToMyHead.NelsonTrooper1FreedExplosives to 1
				EndIf
			ElseIf GetIsReference NelsonNCRHostage03REF == 1
				trapNelsonBIYOB3REF.Enable
				If NelsonNCRTrooperCheck1REF.GetDead == 0
					NelsonNCRTrooperCheck1REF.SetRestrained 1
					NelsonNCRTrooperCheck1REF.MoveTo trapNelsonBIYOB3REF
					NelsonNCRHostage03REF.TravelToREF NelsonNCRTrooperCheck1REF
					Set YouGoToMyHead.NelsonTrooper3FreedExplosives to 1
				EndIf
			EndIf
			Set Freed to 1
			Set YouGoToMyHead.PlantedExplosives to YouGoToMyHead.PlantedExplosives + 1
			Set PlantedExplosives to 1
			Evp
		endif
	endif
END

BEGIN OnDeath

	set VNelson.NumHostages to VNelson.NumHostages - 1
	set VNelson.HostagesKilled to VNelson.HostagesKilled + 1

	; there was previously a check inserted here to see that the Nelson quest was running and incomplete. I don't think that's necessary for Boone to react to the mercy killings,
	; and have removed it. -EPF 7/29/10
	if (VNPCFollowers.bBooneHired == 1 && bBooneReacted == 0 && VNelson.HostagesKilled + VNelson.HostagesFreedTotal>= 3)
		CraigBooneREF.SayTo player VDialogueCraigBooneNelsonReactMercyKill
		set VDialogueCraigBoone.nOpenness to VDialogueCraigboone.nOpenness + 1;
		set bBooneReacted to 1;
	endif

	if VNelson.HostagesKilled == 3 && NVNelsonRangerMiloREF.getdead == 0
		if GetObjectiveDisplayed VNelson 10 == 1 && GetQuestCompleted VNelson == 0
       			setStage VNelson 15
		endif
	endif

END

scn trapNelsonBIYOB


Begin GameMode

	If Eval ((GetDistance2D NelsonNCRHostage02REF < 300) || (GetDistance2D NelsonNCRHostage01REF < 300) || (GetDistance2D NelsonNCRHostage03REF < 300))
		DamageObject 100
	EndIf

End

Scn YouGoToMyHeadSCRIPT

Int TalkedToMilo
Int TalkedToDeadSea
Int DruggedSoldiers
Int IntimidatedSoldiers
Int PlantedExplosives
Int NelsonTrooper1FreedExplosives
Int NelsonTrooper2FreedExplosives
Int NelsonTrooper3FreedExplosives
Int iNCRTroopersDead
Ref rNCRTrooperREF


Begin Gamemode
	
	If Eval (GetGameRestarted) || (GetGameLoaded)
		SetJohnnyOnDyingEventHandler 1 (Begin Function {rNCRTrooperREF}
				Let iNCRTroopersDead += 1
				If Eval iNCRTroopersDead >= 3
					SetStage YouGoToMyHead 20
				EndIf
		End) 0 YGTMHNCRCheckpointRefFormList
	EndIf
	
	If Eval (IntimidatedSoldiers + PlantedExplosives) == 3
		SetObjectiveCompleted YouGoToMyHead 15 1
	EndIf
	
	If Eval (NelsonTrooper1FreedExplosives) && (NelsonNCRHostage01REF.GetDistance2D NelsonNCRTrooperCheck2REF < 1000)
		NelsonNCRHostage01REF.TravelToREF NelsonNCRTrooperCheck2REF 1
	EndIf
	
	If Eval (NelsonTrooper2FreedExplosives) && (NelsonNCRHostage02REF.GetDistance2D NVNelsonRangerMiloREF < 1000)
		NelsonNCRHostage02REF.TravelToREF NVNelsonRangerMiloREF 1
	EndIf
	
	If Eval (NelsonTrooper3FreedExplosives) && (NelsonNCRHostage03REF.GetDistance2D NelsonNCRTrooperCheck1REF < 1000)
		NelsonNCRHostage03REF.TravelToREF NelsonNCRTrooperCheck1REF 1
	EndIf
End

Scn FiveCardAnteScript

Int TalkedToDhatri
Int HuntingNephi
Int TalkedToFrumentarius
Int AcceptedOffer
Int DeclinedOffer
Int SamsonPlantDirect
Int ChoseSneak
Int ChoseExplosives
Int MinesSet
Int EnabledMines
Int PursuingFirstRecon

Int GorobetsAtSamson
Int BetsyAtSamson
Int TenAtSamson
Int SterlingAtSamson
Int BitterAtSamson
Int FirstReconAtSamson

Int DetonatedMines
Int DetonatedGasMines
Int DetonatedC4
Int ChoseSpeech
Int XPCheck
Int SabotagedFirstReconEquipment

Int FirstReconDead
Int HandedInQuest
Int FirstReconEnslaved
Int ConvincedMotorRunner
Int DriverNephiAttackingFR
Int FiendsAttackingFR
Int FiendsReset
Int LegionnariesSpawned

Int PlayerAtSamson
Int fBeeping

Int Cleanup

Ref rFRMember

Int SetArrays
Array_Var FirstReconRefs 
Array_Var C4Refs
Array_Var MineRefs 
Array_Var GasRefs
Array_Var RestrainedMarkerRefs
Array_Var LegionaryRefs
Array_Var LegionMarkers 
Array_Var FCAAllRefs
Array_Var FiendRefs
Array_Var FiendOutfits 

Array_Var Entry
Ref GenericRef
Ref rMarker
Ref FiendWarningScriptRef
Int RefPos

Begin MenuMode 4
	
	; Add FiendOutfitWarningScript from Raiders Disguise Mod via script to prevent potential mod overrides (i.e. JSawyer Ultimate)
	If Eval GetGameRestarted
		Let FiendOutfits := Ar_List ArmorRaider01 ArmorRaider02 ArmorRaider03 ArmorRaider04
		ForEach Entry <- FiendOutfits
			Let GenericRef := *Entry
			SetScript FiendOutfitWarningScript, GenericRef
		Loop
	EndIf
	
End

Begin GameMode
	
	If Eval (GetGameRestarted || GetGameLoaded)
		Let FiendOutfits := Ar_List ArmorRaider01 ArmorRaider02 ArmorRaider03 ArmorRaider04
		ForEach Entry <- FiendOutfits
			Let GenericRef := *Entry
			SetScript FiendOutfitWarningScript, GenericRef
		Loop
		
		; ----------- Constructing Arrays ------------------------
		
		Let FCAAllRefs := Ar_Construct "array"
		;; Activator Mines
		Let MineRefs := Ar_List FCAGorobetsMine FCASterlingMine FCABetsyMine FCABitterRootMine FCATenOfSpadesMine
		
		;; C4 Explosives
		Let C4Refs := Ar_List FCAGorobetsC4 FCASterlingC4 FCABetsyC4 FCABitterRootC4 FCATenOfSpadesC4
		
		;; Gas Mines
		Let GasRefs := Ar_List FCAGorobetsGas FCASterlingGas FCABetsyGas FCABitterRootGas FCATenOfSpadesGas
		
		;; Restrained Markers
		Let RestrainedMarkerRefs := Ar_List FCAGorobetsRestrained FCASterlingRestrained FCABetsyRestrained FCABitterRootRestrained FCATenOfSpadesRestrained
		
		;; Legionnaries
		Let LegionaryRefs := Ar_List FCALegionVexSamsonSpawnREF FCALegionVetSamson01REF FCALegionVetSamson02REF FCALegionVetSamson03REF
		Let LegionMarkers := Ar_List FCALegionVexMoveREF FCALegionVet01MoveREF FCALegionVet02MoveREF FCALegionVeto3MoveREF
		
		;; First Recon Refs
		Let FirstReconRefs := Ar_List LieutenantGorobetsRef CorporalSterlingRef CorporalBetsyRef SergeantBitterRootRef TenOfSpadesRef
		
		; Replacement for OnDeath blocks in scripts attached to each First Recon member for mod compatibility reasons
		SetJohnnyOnDyingEventHandler 1 FCAFirstReconDeathHandlerScript 0 FCAFirstReconList
		
	EndIf
	
	; -------- AUTO-FAIL CONDITIONS -------------------------------------------------------------------
	; Fail quest if Hated or worse with the Legion. Mixed reputation with Legion allows completion
	If Eval GetReputationThreshold RepNVCaesarsLegion 2 >= 5
		SetStage FiveCardAnteQuest 95
	EndIf
	
	; Auto Fail Quest if Driver Nephi is dead before First Recon get to Samson
	If Eval (FiendDriverNephiRef.GetDead) && (!FirstReconAtSamson)
		SetStage FiveCardAnteQuest 95
	EndIf
	; ------------- END -------------------------------
	
	
	; Start Helper Quest If Not Started
	If Eval (GetStage FiveCardAnteQuest >= 10) && (GetStage FiveCardAnteQuest < 90) && (!GetQuestRunning FCAFirstReconCrucifiedQuest)
		StartQuest FCAFirstReconCrucifiedQuest
	EndIf
	
	
	; ----------------- END -------------------
	
	
	; Enable mines at Samson if either the Sneak or Explosives route is chosen
	If Eval GetStage FiveCardAnteQuest >= 30 && EnabledMines == 0 && (ChoseSneak || ChoseExplosives)
		ForEach Entry <- MineRefs 
			Let GenericREF := *Entry
			GenericREF.Enable
		Loop
		Let EnabledMines := 1
		; Disable mines at Samson if Sneak or Explosives are not chosen
	ElseIf Eval GetStage FiveCardAnteQuest >= 30 && ChoseSneak == 0 && ChoseExplosives == 0
		ForEach Entry <- MineRefs 
			Let GenericREF := *Entry
			GenericREF.Disable
		Loop
		Let EnabledMines := 0
	EndIf
	
	; Set stage where Gas mines are set for Stealth route
	If Eval MinesSet == 5 && ChoseSneak
		SetStage FiveCardAnteQuest 41
		
		; Set stage where Explosives mines are set for Explosives route
	ElseIf Eval MinesSet == 5 && ChoseExplosives
		SetStage FiveCardAnteQuest 45
	EndIf
	
	; Advance quest stage to springing trap once First Recon has arrived at Samson
	If Eval FirstReconAtSamson
		SetStage FiveCardAnteQuest 50
	EndIf
	
	; Hide sabotage equipment objective if First Recon has made it to Samson
	If Eval GetObjectiveDisplayed FiveCardAnteQuest 33 && GetObjectiveCompleted FiveCardAnteQuest 33 == 0 && GetStage FiveCardAnteQuest >= 50
		SetObjectiveDisplayed FiveCardAnteQuest 33 0
	EndIf
	
	; Gas mines haver been detonated or First Recon has been killed, move to quest completion phase
	If Eval (DetonatedGasMines) || (FirstReconDead == 5)
		SetStage FiveCardAnteQuest 60
		; Disable teleport REF for quest giver if mines weren't detonated and First Recon are killed
	ElseIf Eval (!DetonatedGasMines) && (FirstReconDead == 5)
		FCAInFrontFirstReconMarker.Disable
	EndIf
	
	; If all of First Recon are at Samson, advance stage to springing trap(s)
	If Eval LieutenantGorobetsRef.GetDistance2D FCAInFrontFirstReconMarker <= 3000 && FirstReconAtSamson == 0
		Let GorobetsAtSamson := 1
	EndIf
	If Eval CorporalBetsyRef.GetDistance2D FCAInFrontFirstReconMarker <= 3000 && FirstReconAtSamson == 0
		Let BetsyAtSamson := 1
	EndIf
	If Eval CorporalSterlingRef.GetDistance2D FCAInFrontFirstReconMarker <= 3000 && FirstReconAtSamson == 0
		Let SterlingAtSamson := 1
	EndIf
	If Eval TenOfSpadesRef.GetDistance2D FCAInFrontFirstReconMarker <= 3000 && FirstReconAtSamson == 0
		Let TenAtSamson := 1
	EndIf
	If Eval SergeantBitterRootRef.GetDistance2D FCAInFrontFirstReconMarker <= 3000 && FirstReconAtSamson == 0
		Let BitterAtSamson := 1
	EndIf
	If Eval (GorobetsAtSamson + BetsyAtSamson + SterlingAtSamson + TenAtSamson + BitterAtSamson) >= 5 && FirstReconAtSamson == 0
		SetStage FiveCardAnteQuest 50
		Let FirstReconAtSamson := 1
	EndIf
	
	; Detonated gas mines for Sneak route; play out enslavement cutscene
	If Eval HandedInQuest == 1 && FirstReconEnslaved == 0 && DetonatedGasMines
		
		imod FadeToBlack5sISFX
		
		FCADisguisedFrumentariusRef.Disable
		
		; Fail I Don't Hurt Anymore if the quest hasn't been completed
		If Eval GetQuestCompleted VMS56 == 0
			SetStage VMS56 110
		EndIf
		
		; Move First Recon to Marker for Enslavement
		
		ForEach Entry  <- FirstReconRefs
			Let GenericRef := *Entry
			GenericRef.RemoveFromAllFactions
			GenericRef.RemoveAllPackages
			GenericRef.MoveTo FCAFirstReconTeleportMarker
		Loop	
		
		Let FirstReconEnslaved := 1
		SetStage FiveCardAnteQuest 90	
	EndIf
	
	; Enable Legion reinforcements if sought help from the Fiends
	If Eval DriverNephiAttackingFR == 1 && LegionnariesSpawned == 0
		ForEach Entry  <- LegionaryRefs
			Let GenericRef := *Entry
			Let rMarker := LegionMarkers[Entry["key"]]
			GenericRef.Enable
			GenericRef.MoveTo rMarker
		Loop
		Let LegionnariesSpawned := 1
	EndIf
	
	; Set all Fiends to Go to FR's general location for combat
	If Eval DriverNephiAttackingFR && FirstReconDead < 5 && !FiendsAttackingFR
		ForEach Entry <- FiendRefs
			Let GenericRef := *Entry
			If Eval GenericRef.GetInFaction FiendsFactionNV
				If Eval !GenericRef.GetDead
					GenericRef.AddScriptPackage FCAFiendsAttackFirstRecon
					GenericRef.Evp
				EndIf
			EndIf
		Loop
		Let FiendsAttackingFR := 1
	EndIf
	
	; Reset Fiends AI once FR are all dead
	If Eval DriverNephiAttackingFR && FirstReconDead >= 5 && !FiendsReset
		ForEach Entry <- FiendRefs
			Let GenericRef := *Entry
			If Eval GenericRef.GetInFaction FiendsFactionNV
				If Eval !GenericRef.GetDead
					GenericRef.ResetAI
				EndIf
			EndIf
		Loop
		Let FiendsReset := 1
	EndIf
	
	; Clean Up Unneeded References and Objects
	If HandedInQuest && Cleanup == 0
		
		; Construct master array to loop through
		Ar_Cat FCAAllRefs MineRefs
		Ar_Cat FCAAllRefs C4Refs
		Ar_Cat FCAAllRefs GasRefs
		Ar_Cat FCAAllRefs RestrainedMarkerRefs
		Ar_Cat FCAAllRefs LegionaryRefs
		Ar_Cat FCAAllRefs LegionMarkers
		
		ForEach Entry  <- FCAAllRefs 
			Let GenericRef := *Entry
			GenericRef.Disable
			GenericRef.MarkForDelete
		Loop
		
		; Teleport Markers
		FCAInFrontFirstReconMarker.Disable
		FCAFrumentariusFRSpawnMarker.Disable
		FCAInFrontFirstReconMarker.MarkForDelete
		FCAFrumentariusFRSpawnMarker.MarkForDelete
		
		Let Cleanup := 1
	EndIf
	
	; Check to see if Player is at Samon usinng xmarker ref. Avoids needing to use a trigger box
	If Eval Player.GetDistance2D FCAInFrontFirstReconMarker <= 3000
		Let PlayerAtSamson := 1
	Else
		Let PlayerAtSamson := 0
	EndIf
	
	; If Player and First Recon are at Samson, and chose Sneak or Explosives route, start beeping sequence with detonator
	If Eval GetObjectiveDisplayed FiveCardAnteQuest 50 && FirstReconAtSamson && PlayerAtSamson && (ChoseSneak || ChoseExplosives) && DetonatedC4 == 0 && DetonatedGasMines == 0 && Player.GetEquipped FCAWeapNVDetonatorFrumentarius
		If fBeeping == 0
			Let fBeeping := (GetSecondsPassed + fBeeping)
			playsound WPNMineTick
			ShowMessage FCADetonatorBeepingMsg
		Else
			Let fBeeping := (GetSecondsPassed + fBeeping)
			If fBeeping >= .5
				Let fBeeping := 0
			EndIf
		EndIf
	EndIf
	
End

scn FCALegionConcealedMineScript
int ButtonVar


Begin OnActivate
	if IsActionRef player
		ShowMessage FCALegionMineMsg
	endif
End

Begin MenuMode 1001
	Let ButtonVar := GetButtonPressed ;Always save the output of GetButtonPressed to a Variable!
	If ButtonVar == 1
		RewardXP 10
		Let FiveCardAnteQuest.MinesSet += 1
		If GetIsReference FCATenOfSpadesMine == 1
			FCATenOfSpadesMine.Disable
		ElseIf GetIsReference FCAGorobetsMine == 1
			FCAGorobetsMine.Disable
		ElseIf GetIsReference FCASterlingMine == 1
			FCASterlingMine.Disable
		ElseIf GetIsReference FCABitterRootMine == 1
			FCABitterRootMine.Disable
		Else GetIsReference FCABetsyMine == 1
			FCABetsyMine.Disable
		EndIf
	ElseIf ButtonVar == 2
		RewardXP 10
		Let FiveCardAnteQuest.MinesSet += 1
		If GetIsReference FCATenOfSpadesMine == 1
			FCATenOfSpadesMine.Disable
			FCATenOfSpadesC4.Enable
		ElseIf GetIsReference FCAGorobetsMine == 1
			FCAGorobetsMine.Disable
			FCAGorobetsC4.Enable
		ElseIf GetIsReference FCASterlingMine == 1
			FCASterlingMine.Disable
			FCASterlingC4.Enable
		ElseIf GetIsReference FCABitterRootMine == 1
			FCABitterRootMine.Disable
			FCABitterRootC4.Enable
		Else GetIsReference FCABetsyMine == 1
			FCABetsyMine.Disable
			FCABetsyC4.Enable
		EndIf
	EndIf
End

scn FCAFrumentariusDetonatorScript

array_var FRMembers
array_var FRGasMines
array_var FRPackages
array_var FRMarkers
array_var FRC4
array_var LegionRefs
array_var LegionMarkers

array_var Entry

int SetArrays

ref rFRMember
ref rGas
ref rPackage
ref rMarker
ref rLegionary
ref rC4

Begin GameMode

	If Eval SetArrays == 0
		Let FRMembers := Ar_List LieutenantGorobetsREF CorporalSterlingREF CorporalBetsyREF SergeantBitterRootREF TenOfSpadesREF
		Let FRGasMines := Ar_List FCAGorobetsGas FCASterlingGas FCABetsyGas FCABitterRootGas FCATenOfSpadesGas
		Let FRPackages := Ar_List FCAGorobetsRestrainedPackage FCASterlingRestrainedPackage FCABetsyRestrainedPackage FCABitterRootRestrainedPackage FCATenOfSpadesRestrainedPackage
		Let FRMarkers := Ar_List FCAGorobetsRestrained FCASterlingRestrained FCABetsyRestrained FCABitterRootRestrained FCATenOfSpadesRestrained
		Let FRC4 := Ar_List FCAGorobetsC4 FCASterlingC4 FCABetsyC4 FCABitterRootC4 FCATenOfSpadesC4
		Let LegionRefs := Ar_List FCALegionVexSamsonSpawnREF FCALegionVetSamson01REF FCALegionVetSamson02REF FCALegionVetSamson03REF
		Let LegionMarkers := Ar_List FCALegionVexMoveREF FCALegionVet01MoveREF FCALegionVet02MoveREF FCALegionVeto3MoveREF
		Let SetArrays := 1
	EndIf

End

Begin OnFire
	If Eval FiveCardAnteQuest.ChoseSneak && FiveCardAnteQuest.FirstReconAtSamson && FiveCardAnteQuest.MinesSet == 5 && FiveCardAnteQuest.DetonatedGasMines == 0 && FiveCardAnteQuest.PlayerAtSamson == 1
		
		PlaySound DRSVaultGearOpenSteam01

		; Remove Factions from First Recon
		; Remove packages
		; Enable Gas mines and play hiss sounds
		; Knock first Recon unconscious
		ForEach Entry <- FRMembers
			Let rFRMember := *Entry
			Let rGas := FRGasMines[Entry["key"]]
			rFRMember.RemoveFromAllFactions
			rFRMember.RemoveAllPackages
			rGas.Enable
			rGas.PlaySound3D DRSVaultGearOpenSteam01
			rFRMember.DamageActorValue Fatigue 1000
		Loop

		; Fade to Black and Move First Recon and Player
		ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlack4sISFX
		Player.SetWeaponOut 0
		Player.SetRestrained 1

		ScriptWait 180
		
		; Wake first recon up and move to restrained markers
		ForEach Entry <- FRMembers
			Let rFRMember := *Entry
			Let rMarker := FRMarkers[Entry["key"]]
			rFRMember.ResurrectActor
			rFRMember.MoveTo rMarker
		Loop

		; Unequip FR's rifles so they properly appear "bounded"
		TenOfSpadesRef.UnequipItem WeapHuntingRifle 0 1
		LieutenantGorobetsRef.UnequipItem WeapHuntingRifle 0 1
		CorporalBetsyRef.UnequipItem WeapHuntingRifle 0 1
		CorporalSterlingRef.UnequipItem WeapNVCowboyRepeaterUnique 0 1
		SergeantBitterRootRef.UnequipItem WeapHuntingRifle 0 1

		ScriptWait 120

		; Remove packages, add each FR member's restrained/bounded package, and evaluate package
		ForEach Entry <- FRMembers
			Let rFRMember := *Entry
			Let rPackage := FRPackages[Entry["key"]]
			rFRMember.RemoveAllPackages
			rFRMember.AddScriptPackage rPackage
			rFRMember.Evp
		Loop

		Player.MoveTo FCAInFrontFirstReconMarker

		ScriptWait 120

		; Enable Legionaries, restrain and move to markers
		ForEach Entry <- LegionRefs
			Let rLegionary := *Entry
			Let rMarker := LegionMarkers[Entry["key"]]
			rLegionary.Enable
			rLegionary.SetRestrained 1
			rLegionary.MoveTo rMarker
		Loop

		ForEach Entry <- FRGasMines
			Let rGas := Entry["value"]
			rGas.Disable
		Loop
		

		ScriptWait 120
		Player.SetRestrained 0
		FCADisguisedFrumentariusRef.MoveTo FCAFrumentariusFRSpawnMarker

		Let FiveCardAnteQuest.DetonatedGasMines := 1

	ElseIf Eval FiveCardAnteQuest.ChoseExplosives && FiveCardAnteQuest.FirstReconAtSamson && FiveCardAnteQuest.MinesSet == 5 && FiveCardAnteQuest.DetonatedC4 == 0 && FiveCardAnteQuest.PlayerAtSamson

		; Detonate C4 charges
		ForEach Entry <- FRC4
			Let rC4 := *Entry
			rC4.DamageObject 100
		Loop

		Let FiveCardAnteQuest.DetonatedC4 := 1
	EndIf
End

scn FCAFirstReconPoisonFootlockerSCRIPT
int button
int SetArrays
array_var Entry
ref GenericRef

Begin GameMode

	If Eval GetGameRestarted
		Let array_var FRMembers := Ar_List LieutenantGorobetsREF CorporalSterlingREF CorporalBetsyREF SergeantBitterRootREF TenOfSpadesREF
		; Let SetArrays := 1

Begin OnActivate

	If Eval GetStage FiveCardAnteQuest >= 30 && GetStage FiveCardAnteQuest < 50 && FiveCardAnteQuest.SabotagedFirstReconEquipment == 0
		ShowMessage FCAFirstReconPoisonMsg
	Else
		Activate
	EndIf

End


Begin MenuMode 1001
	Let button := GetButtonPressed
	If Eval button == 0
	ElseIf button == 1
		Activate
	ElseIf Eval button == 2
		ForEach Entry <- FRMembers
			Let GenericRef := *Entry

		SetObjectiveCompleted FiveCardAnteQuest 33 1

		ForEach Entry <- FRMembers

			Let short iFRGuns := GenericRef.GetAV Guns

		Loop

		SetObjectiveCompleted FiveCardAnteQuest 33 1
		Let FiveCardAnteQuest.SabotagedFirstReconEquipment := 1
	EndIf
End

scn FCAFirstReconCrucifiedScript

array_var Entry
array_var FRMembers
array_var FRCrucpackages
array_var FRCrucifixTeleportREFS 
ref rFRMember
ref rFRPackage
ref rFRTeleport
int DoOnce

Begin GameMode

	Let FRMembers := AR_List LieutenantGorobetsREF CorporalSterlingREF CorporalBetsyREF SergeantBitterRootREF TenOfSpadesREF
	Let FRCrucpackages := Ar_List FCAGorobetsCrucifiedPackage FCASterlingCrucifiedPackage FCABetsyCrucifiedPackage FCABitterRootCrucifiedPackage FCATenOfSpadesCrucifiedPackage
	Let FRCrucifixTeleportREFS := Ar_List FCAGorobetsCrucifixTeleportREF FCASterlingCrucifixTeleportREF FCABetsyCrucifixTeleportREF FCABitterRootCrucifixTeleportREF FCATenOfSpadesCrucifixTeleportREF


	If Eval DoOnce == 0 && GetQuestCompleted FiveCardAnteQuest && FiveCardAnteQuest.FirstReconEnslaved
		Foreach Entry <- FRMembers 
			Let rFRMember := *Entry
			rFRMember.RemoveFromAllFactions
			rFRMember.RemoveAllPackages
		Loop
		Let DoOnce := 1
	EndIf

	; Move First Recon to the fort on game load
	If Eval GetGameLoaded && GetQuestCompleted FiveCardAnteQuest && FiveCardAnteQuest.FirstReconEnslaved 
		ForEach Entry <- FRMembers
			Let rFRMember := *Entry
			Let rFRTeleport := FRCrucifixTeleportRefs[Entry["key"]]
			rFRMember.MoveTo rFRTeleport
		Loop
	EndIf

	; Make sure First Recon has their crucified packages if they're enslaved to the Legion
	If Eval GetQuestCompleted FiveCardAnteQuest && FiveCardAnteQuest.FirstReconEnslaved
		ForEach Entry <- FRMembers
			Let rFRmember := *Entry
			Let rFRPackage := FRCrucPackages[Entry["key"]]
			If Eval rFRMember.GetIsCurrentPackage rFRPackage == 0
				rFRMember.AddPackageAt rFRPackage 0
				rFRMember.Evp
			EndIf
		Loop
	EndIf


	ForEach Entry <- FRMembers
		Let rFRMember := *Entry
		If Eval rFRMember.GetSitting == 3 && GetQuestCompleted FiveCardAnteQuest && FiveCardAnteQuest.FirstReconEnslaved
			rFRMember.SetRestrained 1
			rFRMember.SetUnconscious 1
			rFRMember.IgnoreCrime 1
		ElseIf rFRMember.GetSitting != 3 && GetQuestCompleted FiveCardAnteQuest && FiveCardAnteQuest.FirstReconEnslaved
			rFRMember.SetRestrained 0
			rFRMember.SetUnconscious 0
			rFRMember.IgnoreCrime 1
		EndIf
	Loop
End

scn FiendOutfitWarningScript

float fUpdatedNegNCR
float fUpdatedPosNCR

float fUpdatedNegCL
float fUpdatedPosCL

float fUpdatedNegBoS
float fUpdatedPosBoS

float fUpdatedNegGK
float fUpdatedPosGK

float fUpdatedNegPG
float fUpdatedPosPG

Begin OnEquip Player

	;Check to see if player was wearing faction armor. 
	if DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.bFactionArmorEquipped == 0

		;Set variable to track wearing faction armor
		set DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.bFactionArmorEquipped to 1

		;Player was not wearing faction armor - so we store their reputation values, we don't need to clear it here, it'll get cleared below
		;Store Reputations
		set DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fNCRNegReputation to GetReputation RepNVNCR 0
		set DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fNCRPosReputation to GetReputation RepNVNCR 1
	
		set DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fLegionNegReputation to GetReputation RepNVCaesarsLegion 0
		set DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fLegionPosReputation to GetReputation RepNVCaesarsLegion 1
	
		set DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fBoSNegReputation to GetReputation RepNVBrotherhood 0
		set DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fBoSPosReputation to GetReputation RepNVBrotherhood 1
	
		set DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fKhanNegReputation to GetReputation RepNVGreatKhans 0
		set DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fKhanPosReputation to GetReputation RepNVGreatKhans 1
	
		set DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fPowderNegReputation to GetReputation RepNVPowderGanger 0
		set DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fPowderPosReputation to GetReputation RepNVPowderGanger 1

	else
		;Get Current Faction Values and add stored values
		set DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fNCRNegReputation to GetReputation RepNVNCR 0 + DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fNCRNegReputation
		set DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fNCRPosReputation to GetReputation RepNVNCR 1+ DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fNCRPosReputation

		set DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fLegionNegReputation to GetReputation RepNVCaesarsLegion 0 + DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fLegionNegReputation
		set DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fLegionPosReputation to GetReputation RepNVCaesarsLegion 1 + DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fLegionPosReputation

		set DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fBoSNegReputation to GetReputation RepNVBrotherhood 0 + DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fBoSNegReputation
		set DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fBoSPosReputation to GetReputation RepNVBrotherhood 1 + DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fBoSPosReputation

		set DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fKhanNegReputation to GetReputation RepNVGreatKhans 0 + DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fKhanNegReputation
		set DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fKhanPosReputation to GetReputation RepNVGreatKhans 1 + DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fKhanPosReputation

		set DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fPowderNegReputation to GetReputation RepNVPowderGanger 0 + DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fPowderNegReputation
		set DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fPowderPosReputation to GetReputation RepNVPowderGanger 1 + DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fPowderPosReputation

	endif

	if VFactionArmorTutorial == 0
		ShowMessage VFactionOutfitTutorial
		set VFactionArmorTutorial to 1
	endif

	ShowMessage FCAFiendsFactionOutfitWarning
	StartQuest DisguiseFactionPulseQuest ;Kicks the pulse placing quest
	setally FiendsFactionNV PlayerFaction 1 1
	player.addtofaction FiendsFactionNV 0

	;Clear Reputations
	SetReputation RepNVNCR 0 0.0
	SetReputation RepNVNCR 1 0.0

	SetReputation RepNVCaesarsLegion 0 0.0
	SetReputation RepNVCaesarsLegion 1 0.0

	SetReputation RepNVBrotherhood 0 0.0
	SetReputation RepNVBrotherhood 1 0.0

	SetReputation RepNVGreatKhans 0 0.0
	SetReputation RepNVGreatKhans 1 0.0

	SetReputation RepNVPowderGanger 0 0.0
	SetReputation RepNVPowderGanger 1 0.0

end

Begin OnUnequip Player
	if Player.GetEquipped RepairRaiderArmor == 0
		SetEnemy FiendsFactionNV PlayerFaction 1 1
		player.RemoveFromFaction FiendsFactionNV 
		ShowMessage FCAFiendsFactionOutfitWarningoff

		;Restore Factions
		;Get Current Values and add stored values
		set fUpdatedNegNCR to GetReputation RepNVNCR 0 + DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fNCRNegReputation
		set fUpdatedPosNCR to GetReputation RepNVNCR 1+ DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fNCRPosReputation

		set fUpdatedNegCL to GetReputation RepNVCaesarsLegion 0 + DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fLegionNegReputation
		set fUpdatedPosCL to GetReputation RepNVCaesarsLegion 1 + DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fLegionPosReputation

		set fUpdatedNegBoS to GetReputation RepNVBrotherhood 0 + DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fBoSNegReputation
		set fUpdatedPosBoS to GetReputation RepNVBrotherhood 1 + DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fBoSPosReputation

		set fUpdatedNegGK to GetReputation RepNVGreatKhans 0 + DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fKhanNegReputation
		set fUpdatedPosGK to GetReputation RepNVGreatKhans 1 + DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fKhanPosReputation

		set fUpdatedNegPG to GetReputation RepNVPowderGanger 0 + DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fPowderNegReputation
		set fUpdatedPosPG to GetReputation RepNVPowderGanger 1 + DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.fPowderPosReputation

	endif

	;If the player is not wearing ANY faction armor, clear this variable.
	if (Player.GetEquipped FactionGearNVNCR == 0) && (Player.GetEquipped FactionGearNVCaesar == 0) && (Player.GetEquipped FactionGearNVBrotherhood == 0) && (Player.GetEquipped FactionGearNVGreatKhans == 0) && (Player.GetEquipped FactionGearNVPowder == 0) && (player.GetEquipped VMS18WhiteGloveMask == 0 || (Player.GetEquipped OutfitFormalWear == 0 && player.GetEquipped ArmorWhiteGloveSociety == 0))
		;Clear Wearing Faction Armor Variable
		set DisguiseFactionPulseQuest.bFactionArmorEquipped to 0

		;Set Reputation Values to Updated
		SetReputation RepNVNCR 0 fUpdatedNegNCR
		SetReputation RepNVNCR 1 fUpdatedPosNCR

		SetReputation RepNVCaesarsLegion 0 fUpdatedNegCL
		SetReputation RepNVCaesarsLegion 1 fUpdatedPosCL

		SetReputation RepNVBrotherhood 0 fUpdatedNegBoS
		SetReputation RepNVBrotherhood 1 fUpdatedPosBoS

		SetReputation RepNVGreatKhans 0 fUpdatedNegGK
		SetReputation RepNVGreatKhans 1 fUpdatedPosGK

		SetReputation RepNVPowderGanger 0 fUpdatedNegPG
		SetReputation RepNVPowderGanger 1 fUpdatedPosPG
	endif

end

scn LegionYIWAMarcellusScript

Begin OnDeath
	SetStage YesIWouldActually 95
End

Scn YesIWouldActuallySCRIPT


Int TalkedToMarcellus ; Check to not repeating first greeting dialogue when talking to Marcellus
Int AcceptedOffer
Int OfferedHelpToGilles
Int NoNotMuchTasksDetailed ; Maximum of 3: has the player heard all the problems with Bitter Springs from Gilles
Int ReinforcementsAtBitterSprings ; Amount of NCR troopers sent to Bitter Springs as a result of the Player completing objectives in No, Not Much
Int BitterSpringsDeadNCR ; Amount of dead NCR troopers at Bitter Springs
Int BitterSpringsNCRSoldiers
Int RecruitedNCRHelp
Int BadPsychBookDelivered
Int BadPediaBookDelivered
Int BooksDelivered
Int TalkedToOscar
Int TalkedToGilles
Int RecruitedOscarVelasco
Int KnowsAllTasks
Int AllNCRDead
Int OscarReturnedToCave
Int OscarAttackingBitterSprings
Int LegionAttackingBitterSprings
Int RecruitedKhansHelp
Int RangerSpawnChance
Int RangerSpawned
Int HelpSpawned
Int PatrolsEnabled
Int OscarScripts

Int iArraysSet
Int iReinforcementsCounted
Array_Var aNCRSoldierCoreREFS
Array_Var aNCRSoldierReinforcementsREFS
Array_Var aNCRAllSoldierRefs
Array_Var aKhanReinforcementREFS
Array_Var aLegionReinforcementREFS
Array_Var aPlayerReinforcementREFS
Array_Var aRefugeeRefs
Array_Var aSuppliesForms
Array_Var aRefugeeRestrainedMarkers
Array_Var aRefugeePackages
Array_Var Entry
Ref GenericREF

Int iSetEvent
Int iRepChangedToLegion
Ref rKhanSupplies

Begin GameMode
	
	If Eval (GetGameRestarted || GetGameLoaded)
		
		Let aNCRSoldierCoreREFS := Ar_List VBSCaptainGillesREF, VBSTrooper3REF, VBSTrooper1REF, VBSTrooper2REF
		Let aNCRSoldierReinforcementsREFS := Ar_List VBSGolfTrooper2REF, VBSGolfTrooper1REF, VBSMcCarranTrooper1REF, VBSMcCarranTrooper2REF, VBSForlornHopeTrooper1REF, VBSForlornHopeTrooper2REF, VBSRangerSupport2REF
		Ar_Cat aNCRAllSoldierRefs aNCRSoldierCoreREFS 
		Ar_Cat aNCRAllSoldierRefs aNCRSoldierReinforcementsREFS 
		Let aKhanReinforcementREFS := Ar_List VBSKhan1REF, VBSKhan2REF, VBSKhan3REF
		Let aLegionReinforcementREFS := Ar_List VBSLegVex1REF, VBSLegRecruit1REF, VBSLegRecruit2REF, VBSLegDecanus1REF
		Let aRefugeeRefs := Ar_List VBSRefugeeFemale1REF, VBSRefugeeMale1REF, VBSRefugeeChild1REF, VBSRefugeeChild2REF, VBSRefugeeFemale2REF, VBSRefugeeFemaleSick1REF, VBSRefugeeMaleSick1REF, VBSRefugeeChildSick1REF, VBSRefugeeChildSick2REF, VBSRefugeeFemaleSick2REF, VBSRefugeeMaleSick2REF
		Let aRefugeeRestrainedMarkers := Ar_List YIWARefugeeFemale1RestrainedMarker, YIWARefugeeMale1RestrainedMarker, YIWARefugeeChild1RestrainedMarker, YIWARefugeeChild2RestrainedMarker, YIWARefugeeFemale2RestrainedMarker, YIWARefugeeFemaleSick1RestrainedMarker
		Let Array_Var aMarkersToAdd := Ar_List YIWARefugeeMaleSick1RestrainedMarker, YIWARefugeeChildSick1RestrainedMarker, YIWARefugeeChildSick2RestrainedMarker, YIWARefugeeFemaleSick2RestrainedMarker, YIWARefugeeMaleSick2RestrainedMarker
		Ar_Cat aRefugeeRestrainedMarkers aMarkersToAdd
		Let aRefugeePackages := Ar_List YIWARefugeeFemale1RestrainedPackage, YIWARefugeeMale1RestrainedPackage, YIWARefugeeChild1RestrainedPackage, YIWARefugeeChild2RestrainedPackage, YIWARefugeeFemale2RestrainedPackage, YIWARefugeeFemaleSick1RestrainedPackage
		Let Array_Var aPackagesToAdd := Ar_List YIWARefugeeMaleSick1RestrainedPackage, YIWARefugeeChildSick1RestrainedPackage, YIWARefugeeChildSick2RestrainedPackage, YIWARefugeeFemaleSick2RestrainedPackage, YIWARefugeeMaleSick2RestrainedPackage
		Ar_Cat aRefugeePackages aPackagesToAdd
		Let aSuppliesForms := Ar_List VBSGreatKhanSupplies, VBSDirtySupplies
		
		
		; Replacement for OnDeath scripts attached to NCR soldier objects
		; For Some reason SetJohnnyOnDyingEventHandler doesn't work with the following UDF, no idea why :pepesad:
		SetEventHandler "OnDeath" YIWANCRDeathHandlerUDFSCRIPT  "first"::YIWANCRSoldierForms "priority"::1
		SetJohnnyOnDyingEventHandler 1 YIWAOscarDeathHandlerScript 0 VBSOscarVelasco
		; SetOnHitEventHandler YIWAOnHitNCRHandlerScript 1 VBSCaptainGillesREF
		SetEventHandler "OnHit" YIWAOnHitNCRHandlerScript "first"::YIWANCRSoldierForms "priority"::1
		
	EndIf
	
	Let ReinforcementsAtBitterSprings := (!(VBSGolfTrooper1REF.GetDisabled) + !(VBSGolfTrooper2REF.GetDisabled) + !(VBSMcCarranTrooper1REF.GetDisabled) + !(VBSMcCarranTrooper2REF.GetDisabled) + !(VBSForlornHopeTrooper1REF.GetDisabled) + !(VBSForlornHopeTrooper2REF.GetDisabled) + !(VBSRangerSupport2REF.GetDisabled))
	
	; Indicator variable for if any NCR reinforcements are at Bitter Springs from No, Not Much
	If Eval ReinforcementsAtBitterSprings > 0
		Let RecruitedNCRHelp := 1
	EndIf
	
	Let BitterSpringsNCRSoldiers := (5 + ReinforcementsAtBitterSprings)
	
	
	
	; Progress quest once help offerred to Gilles
	If Eval NoNotMuchTasksDetailed == 3
		SetStage YesIWouldActually 20
	EndIf
	
	; Player has both bad books
	If Eval Player.GetItemCount VBSPsychologyBookBad >= 1 && Player.GetItemCount VBSPediatricsBookBad >= 1 && GetStage YesIWouldActually >= 30 && GetStage YesIWouldActually < 70
		SetObjectiveCompleted YesIWouldActually 32 1
		SetObjectiveDisplayed YesIWouldActually 33 1
	EndIf
	
	Let BooksDelivered := (BadPsychBookDelivered + BadPediaBookDelivered)
	
	; All NCR soldiers are dead, return for reward
	If Eval (BitterSpringsDeadNCR >= BitterSpringsNCRSoldiers) && (GetStage YesIWouldActually >= 10)
		Let AllNCRDead := 1
		SetStage YesIWouldActually 80
	EndIf
	
	; Delivering the 2 bad books
	If Eval (BooksDelivered == 2) && (GetStage YesIWouldActually >= 30)
		SetObjectiveCompleted YesIWouldActually 33 1
	EndIf
	
	; Crafting Unsanitary Doctor's Bags
	If Eval (Player.GetItemCount NVDoctorBagBad >= 3) && (GetStage YesIWouldActually >= 30) && (GetStage YesIWouldActually < 70)
		SetObjectiveCompleted YesIWouldActually 40 1
		SetObjectiveDisplayed YesIWouldActually 43 1
	EndIf
	
	; Has the player completed at least 2 tasks (3 if the NCR has reinforcements) to be ready to assault Bitter Springs?
	If Eval (GetObjectiveCompleted YesIWouldActually 33 + GetObjectiveCompleted YesIWouldActually 35 + GetObjectiveCompleted YesIWouldActually 43 + GetObjectiveCompleted YesIWouldActually 50 + GetObjectiveCompleted YesIWouldActually 85) >= (2 + RecruitedNCRHelp)
		SetStage YesIWouldActually 40
	EndIf
	
	; If the NCR has reinforcements, suggest the player recruit the Khans
	If Eval (ReinforcementsAtBitterSprings > 0) && (GetStage YesIWouldActually >= 30) && (GetStage YesIWouldActually < 70)
		SetObjectiveDisplayed YesIWouldActually 50 1
	EndIf
	
	If Eval RecruitedKhansHelp == 1 && GetStage YesIWouldActually >= 30 && GetStage YesIWouldActually < 70
		SetObjectiveCompleted YesIWouldActually 50 1 
		; SetObjectiveDisplayed YesIWouldActually 60 1
	EndIf
	
	; Spawn Ranger if random percent chance is less than 25
	If Eval (ReinforcementsAtBitterSprings > 0 || RecruitedKhansHelp == 1) && (LegionAttackingBitterSprings == 1 || OscarAttackingBitterSprings == 1) && RangerSpawned == 0
		Let RangerSpawnChance := GetRandomPercent
		If Eval RangerSpawnChance < 25
			VBSRangerSupport2REF.Enable
		EndIf
		Let RangerSpawned := 1
	EndIf
	
	
	
	; Ready Oscar's Packages
	If Eval (RecruitedOscarVelasco) && (!AllNCRDead) && (VBSOscarVelascoREF.GetIsCurrentPackage YIWAMoveOscarToRendezvousPackage == 0) && (GetStage YesIWouldActually < 70)
		VBSOscarVelascoREF.AddScriptPackage YIWAMoveOscarToRendezvousPackage
		; VBSOscarVelascoREF.Evp
	EndIf
	
	; Enable Reinforcements, Add attack package, and Evaluate Packages
	If Eval (LegionAttackingBitterSprings) && (!AllNCRDead) && (!HelpSpawned)
		
		ForEach Entry <- aRefugeeRefs
			Let GenericRef := *Entry
			GenericRef.RemoveFromAllFactions
		Loop
		
		ForEach Entry <- aLegionReinforcementRefs
			Let GenericRef := *Entry
			GenericRef.Enable
			GenericRef.AddScriptPackage YIWAAttackBitterSprings
			; GenericRef.Evp
		Loop
		
		If Eval (RecruitedKhansHelp)
			ForEach Entry <- aKhanReinforcementRefs
				Let GenericRef := *Entry
				GenericRef.Enable
				GenericRef.AddScriptPackage YIWAAttackBitterSprings
				; GenericRef.Evp
			Loop
		EndIf
		
		LegionYIWAMarcellusREF.AddScriptPackage YIWAAttackBitterSprings
		; LegionYIWAMarcellusREF.Evp
		
		If Eval (VBSLegVex1REF.GetIsCurrentPackage YIWAAttackBitterSprings) + (VBSLegVex1REF.GetIsCurrentPackage YIWAAttackBitterSprings) >= 2
			If Eval OscarAttackingBitterSprings == 1 && VBSOscarVelascoREF.GetIsCurrentPackage YIWAAttackBitterSprings == 1
				Let HelpSpawned := 1
			ElseIf Eval OscarAttackingBitterSprings == 1 && VBSOscarVelascoREF.GetIsCurrentPackage YIWAAttackBitterSprings == 0
				; VBSOscarVelascoREF.RemoveAllPackages
				VBSOscarVelascoREF.AddScriptPackage YIWAAttackBitterSprings
				; VBSOscarVelascoREF.Evp
				; Let HelpSpawned := 1
			ElseIf Eval OscarAttackingBitterSprings == 0
				Let HelpSpawned := 1
			EndIf
		EndIf
	EndIf
	
	If Eval AllNCRDead && GetQuestCompleted YesIWouldActually == 0
		BitterSpringsMarkerREF.SetMapMarkerRep RepNVCaesarsLegion
		
		ForEach Entry <- aLegionReinforcementRefs
			Let GenericRef := *Entry
			GenericRef.RemoveScriptPackage YIWAAttackBitterSprings
			GenericRef.AddPackageAt VBSTrooperPatrol29x8 0
			GenericRef.Evp
		Loop
		
		If Eval RecruitedKhansHelp == 1
			ForEach Entry <- aKhanReinforcementRefs
				Let GenericRef := *Entry
				GenericRef.RemoveScriptPackage YIWAAttackBitterSprings
				GenericRef.AddPackageAt VBSTrooperPatrol17x8 0
				GenericRef.Evp
			Loop
		EndIf
		
		If Eval OscarAttackingBitterSprings == 1
			VBSOscarVelascoREF.RemoveScriptPackage YIWAAttackBitterSprings
			VBSOscarVelascoREF.RemoveScriptPackage YIWAMoveOscarToRendezvousPackage
			VBSOscarVelascoREF.ResetAI
		EndIf
		
		LegionYIWAMarcellusREF.AddPackageAt VBSCaptainGillesPatrol16x5 0
		LegionYIWAMarcellusREF.Evp
	EndIf
	
	
	
End

scn YIWADynamicSuppliesMenuSCRIPT

int iButton

int iIndex
string_var sMenu
ref rSupplies

Begin Function {iButton} ; Need to pass -1 by default when calling

	Let iIndex := -1
	Let sMenu := "^Great Khan Supplies^You see a set of Great Khan Supplies."

	; Add option to do nothing
	Let iIndex += 1
	Let sMenu += "|Leave it alone."
	If Eval iButton == iIndex
		Return
	EndIf

	Let iIndex += 1
	Let sMenu += "|Pick Up The Supplies As-Is."
	If Eval iButton == iIndex
		Let rSupplies := YesIWouldActually.rKhanSupplies
		rSupplies.Activate
		Return
	EndIf

	MessageBoxExAlt YIWADynamicSuppliesMenuSCRIPT $sMenu

End

scn YIWAHelpQuestScript


array_var aKhanReinforcementREFS
array_var aLegionReinforcementREFS
array_var aRefugeeRefs
array_var aLegionMovePackages
array_var aLegionMoveMarkers
array_var Entry
ref GenericREF
int iCFTMIndex
ref rCFTMBitterSpringsTentREF
int iArraysSet
array_var aRefugeePackages
array_var aRefugeeRestrainedMarkers
ref GenericPackage
ref GenericMarker
int RefugeesTeleported
int RefugeesRestrained


Begin GameMode


	If Eval YesIWouldActually.AllNCRDead

		

		If Eval GetGameLoaded

			Let aKhanReinforcementREFS := Ar_List VBSKhan1REF, VBSKhan2REF, VBSKhan3REF
			Let aLegionReinforcementREFS := Ar_List VBSLegVex1REF, VBSLegRecruit1REF, VBSLegRecruit2REF, VBSLegDecanus1REF
			Let aRefugeeRefs := Ar_List VBSRefugeeFemale1REF, VBSRefugeeMale1REF, VBSRefugeeChild1REF, VBSRefugeeChild2REF, VBSRefugeeFemale2REF, VBSRefugeeFemaleSick1REF, VBSRefugeeMaleSick1REF, VBSRefugeeChildSick1REF, VBSRefugeeChildSick2REF, VBSRefugeeFemaleSick2REF, VBSRefugeeMaleSick2REF
			Let aRefugeeRestrainedMarkers := Ar_List YIWARefugeeFemale1RestrainedMarker, YIWARefugeeMale1RestrainedMarker, YIWARefugeeChild1RestrainedMarker, YIWARefugeeChild2RestrainedMarker, YIWARefugeeFemale2RestrainedMarker, YIWARefugeeFemaleSick1RestrainedMarker
			Let array_var aMarkersToAdd := Ar_List YIWARefugeeMaleSick1RestrainedMarker, YIWARefugeeChildSick1RestrainedMarker, YIWARefugeeChildSick2RestrainedMarker, YIWARefugeeFemaleSick2RestrainedMarker, YIWARefugeeMaleSick2RestrainedMarker
			Ar_Cat aRefugeeRestrainedMarkers aMarkersToAdd
			Let aRefugeePackages := Ar_List YIWARefugeeFemale1RestrainedPackage, YIWARefugeeMale1RestrainedPackage, YIWARefugeeChild1RestrainedPackage, YIWARefugeeChild2RestrainedPackage, YIWARefugeeFemale2RestrainedPackage, YIWARefugeeFemaleSick1RestrainedPackage
			Let array_var aPackagesToAdd := Ar_List YIWARefugeeMaleSick1RestrainedPackage, YIWARefugeeChildSick1RestrainedPackage, YIWARefugeeChildSick2RestrainedPackage, YIWARefugeeFemaleSick2RestrainedPackage, YIWARefugeeMaleSick2RestrainedPackage
			Ar_Cat aRefugeePackages aPackagesToAdd
			Let aLegionMoveMarkers := Ar_List YIWALeg1MoveMarker, YIWALeg2MoveMarker, YIWALeg3MoveMarker, YIWALeg4MoveMarker
			Let aLegionMovePackages := Ar_List YIWALeg1MovePackage, YIWALeg2MovePackage, YIWALeg3MovePackage, YIWALeg4MovePackage

			BitterSpringsMarkerREF.SetMapMarkerRep RepNVCaesarsLegion
			If Eval IsModLoaded "Convenient Fast Travel Markers.esp"
				; Let rCFTMBitterSpringsTentREF := EditorIDToFormID "bitterspringsCommandMarker"
				Let rCFTMBitterSpringsTentREF := GetFormFromMod "Convenient Fast Travel Markers.esp" "2A76"
				rCFTMBitterSpringsTentREF.SetMapMarkerRep RepNVCaesarsLegion
			EndIf

			ForEach Entry <- aLegionReinforcementRefs
				Let GenericRef := *Entry
				Let GenericMarker := aLegionMoveMarkers[Entry["key"]]
				Let GenericPackage := aLegionMovePackages[Entry["key"]]
				; GenericRef.RemoveScriptPackage YIWAAttackBitterSprings
				If Eval GenericRef.GetDisabled
					GenericRef.Enable
				EndIf
				If Eval !(GenericRef.GetDisabled)
					GenericRef.RemoveAllPackages
					GenericRef.MoveTo GenericMarker
					If Eval !(GenericRef.GetIsCurrentPackage GenericPackage)
						GenericRef.AddPackageAt GenericPackage 0
						GenericRef.Evp
					EndIf
				EndIf
			Loop

			If Eval YesIWouldActually.RecruitedOscarVelasco
				VBSOscarVelascoREF.RemoveScriptPackage YIWAAttackBitterSprings
				VBSOscarVelascoREF.RemoveScriptPackage YIWAMoveOscarToRendezvousPackage
				; VBSOscarVelascoREF.AddScriptPackage VBSOscarCaveSandbox
				; VBSOscarVelascoREF.Evp
				VBSOscarVelascoREF.ResetAI
			EndIf

			LegionYIWAMarcellusREF.AddPackageAt VBSCaptainGillesPatrol16x5 0

			If Eval !RefugeesTeleported
				ForEach Entry <- aRefugeeRefs
					Let GenericRef := *Entry
					If Eval !(GenericRef.GetDead) && !(GenericRef.GetDisabled)
						GenericRef.RemoveFromAllFactions
						GenericRef.RemoveAllPackages
						GenericRef.AddToFaction VCaesarsLegionFaction 0
						Let GenericMarker := aRefugeeRestrainedMarkers[Entry["key"]]
						If Eval GenericMarker.GetDisabled
							GenericMarker.Enable
						EndIf
						Let GenericPackage := aRefugeePackages[Entry["key"]]
						GenericRef.MoveTo GenericMarker
						If Eval GenericRef.GetIsCurrentPackage GenericPackage == 0
							GenericRef.AddPackageAt GenericPackage 0
							; GenericRef.Evp
						EndIf
					EndIf
				Loop
				Let RefugeesTeleported := 1
			EndIf

		EndIf
		

		
		; Set Refugees as Restrained to Get them to Sit at the Restrained Markers
		If Eval !(RefugeesRestrained)
			ForEach Entry <- aRefugeeRefs
				Let GenericRef := *Entry
				Let GenericMarker := aRefugeeRestrainedMarkers[Entry["key"]]
				If Eval !(GenericRef.GetDead)
					If Eval GenericRef.GetSitting == 3 && GenericRef.GetDistance2D GenericMarker < 200
						GenericRef.SetRestrained 1
						GenericRef.SetUnconscious 1
						GenericRef.IgnoreCrime 1
					ElseIf Eval GenericRef.GetSitting != 3 && GenericRef.GetDistance2D GenericMarker < 200
						GenericRef.SetRestrained 0
						GenericRef.SetUnconscious 0
						GenericRef.IgnoreCrime 1
					EndIf
				EndIf
			Loop
			; Let RefugeesRestrained := 1
		EndIf

	EndIf

End

		SetStage YesIWouldActually 70
	EndIf

	; Print $rAttacker

End
